name: Baked Mostaccioli
author: Becky Schwartz
instructions: Cook mostaccioli in large amount of boiling salted water for about 14 minutes. Set aside. In large saucepan, cook ground beef and onion until meat is browned. Drain off fat. Stir in undrained toma- toes, tomato sauce, tomato paste, undrained mushrooms, water, salt, sugar and basil. Bring to a boil. Cover and simmer for 10 minutes. Stir in mostaccioli and Mozzarella cheese. Place mixture into 3 quart casserole or 13 x 9 x 2 inch baking dish. Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese. Cover with foil Bake in 350Â° oven about 30 minutes. Let stand 5 minutes before serving.
